faq.question: Is Ultra Femme 360 painful?
faq.answer: No. Most women describe gentle warmth, like a warm massage. We can adjust energy instantly if needed. Treatment is comfortable enough that most women read or relax during sessions.

faq.question: How soon can I resume intimacy after Ultra Femme?
faq.answer: Immediately. Some women prefer to wait 24 hours for comfort, but it's not required. There's truly zero downtime—you can return to all activities the same day.

faq.question: How much does Ultra Femme 360 cost in London?
faq.answer: The Core Rejuvenation Course (3 sessions) is £1,250 (save £200). Ultra Femme + O-Shot is £1,950 (save £350). The Ultimate Confidence Plan with EMSELLA is £2,450 (save £500). Consultation fee (£100) is credited toward treatment.

faq.question: How many Ultra Femme sessions do I need?
faq.answer: The standard course is 3 weekly sessions for optimal results. Most women notice improvement after session one, with peak results at 8-12 weeks. Maintenance sessions every 9-12 months sustain results.

faq.question: Can I combine Ultra Femme with the O-Shot?
faq.answer: Yes, and results are often amplified. We usually schedule RF first, then PRP in the same visit or within a week. The combination addresses both structure and sensation.

faq.question: Will Ultra Femme help bladder leaks?
faq.answer: Ultra Femme improves tissue support, and pairing it with EMSELLA maximizes continence gains. Many women find significant improvement in stress incontinence with this combination.

faq.question: How often do I need Ultra Femme maintenance?
faq.answer: Most patients repeat one session every 9-12 months to maintain results. Some women schedule maintenance before holidays or special occasions for an extra confidence boost.

faq.question: Is Ultra Femme safe after childbirth?
faq.answer: Yes—once you're cleared for intimacy (usually 6+ weeks postpartum). We tailor settings for new mothers and can adjust protocols based on delivery type and healing progress.

howItWorks.title: How RF Tightens & Hydrates
howItWorks.content: Ultra Femme 360 uses monopolar radiofrequency to heat tissue evenly at therapeutic temperatures. This controlled heat contracts existing collagen fibres and stimulates fibroblasts to create new collagen and elastin over the following weeks. Increased blood flow and lymphatic drainage improve hydration, pH, and tissue resilience.
howItWorks.subtitle: Collagen remodelling without scalpels or hormones

seo.metaDescription: Experience Ultra Femme 360 in London—tighten the vagina, improve lubrication, and lift labial tissue in under 30 minutes. Doctor-led intimate health clinic.

schema.howPerformed: You lie comfortably in a private suite while two specially designed applicators deliver gentle radiofrequency warmth. The internal applicator (about the size of a tampon) treats the vaginal canal for 8 minutes—you'll feel soothing warmth, never pain. Then the external applicator smooths and lifts labial tissue for another 8 minutes. No needles, no numbing, no discomfort. Just therapeutic heat that triggers collagen renewal deep within
schema.preparation: Schedule treatment during the middle of your cycle (not during menstruation). Shower beforehand and wear comfortable, loose clothing. No sexual activity 24 hours before. Empty your bladder just before treatment. Bring headphones if you'd like to listen to music. Female staff available by request. This is your time—we make it calm and dignified
schema.followup: You can resume all activities immediately, including intimacy if desired (though many women prefer to wait 24 hours for comfort). Drink plenty of water to support tissue healing. Avoid very hot baths or saunas for 48 hours. You'll attend three sessions spaced one week apart. Results build cumulatively—most women notice tightness after session one, with peak improvement 8-12 weeks after completing the series
schema.outcome: Vaginal tightness improves noticeably—intimacy feels more connected and satisfying. Natural lubrication increases, ending the discomfort of dryness. External tissue appears smoother and more lifted. Many women report better bladder control when combined with pelvic exercises. Confidence in clothing and intimacy returns. Results last 12+ months, and you can repeat treatment yearly to maintain
schema.treatmentFrequency: Three weekly sessions for optimal results, then one maintenance session every 9-12 months. Many women combine with O-Shot PRP for enhanced sensation and lubrication
schema.adverseOutcome: Mild warmth or tingling during treatment (normal and comfortable). Temporary slight redness externally for 1-2 hours. Very rarely, mild sensitivity for 24 hours. No burns, no scarring when performed correctly
typicalTest: Discussion of intimate concerns and goals
Optional bladder function assessment if incontinence present
clinicalFindings: Vaginal laxity after childbirth or aging
Discomfort during intimacy due to tissue changes

overview.title: What Ultra Femme 360 Delivers
highlights: Treats internal and external tissue in one visit
Safe for most women, including postnatal and menopausal patients
overview.content: Two ergonomically designed applicators treat the vagina and vulva in a single appointment. Internally, RF energy rebuilds collagen for better tone, moisture, and support. Externally, the 360° applicator smooths, plumps, and lifts labial tissue for a youthful contour. The treatment is comfortable, discreet, and clinically proven to enhance sexual satisfaction and urinary support.

tagline: Tighter Tissue. Better Moisture. Zero Downtime.
longDescription: Ultra Femme 360™ is a comfortable, in-clinic radiofrequency treatment that simultaneously rejuvenates internal vaginal tissue and external labial skin. The sterile applicators warm tissue to 42–45°C, triggering collagen remodelling, improved blood flow, and better hydration. Patients describe it as a gentle, warm massage; there is no anaesthetic, no needles, and no downtime.\n\nAt Dr. SNA Clinic, Ultra Femme 360 is delivered in private suites with optional chaperones. We combine hormone-aware diagnostics, precise treatment mapping, and custom aftercare so you can reclaim confidence after childbirth, menopause, or simply the effects of time.
